        Returns:

      • existsInAdjacentList

        public boolean existsInAdjacentList(Country selectedCountry,
                                    java.lang.String addingCountry)
        This method is used to check if the country input already exists in the adjacent list of the selected country
        Parameters:
        selectedCountry - The country which is selected
        addingCountry - The name of country to be searched in the adjacent list
        Returns:
        true if the country already exists in the adjacent list, false otherwise

      • removeAdjacentCountry

        public void removeAdjacentCountry(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Continent> continentlist,
                                  Country selectedCountry,
                                  Country removingCountry)
        This method remove adjacent territory and all of its connections
        Parameters:
        continentlist - this is the list of all the continents
        selectedCountry - territory that was selected
        removingCountry - territory to remove from adjacency

      • loadMapHandler

        public void loadMapHandler()
                    throws CannotFindException,
                           DuplicatesException,
                           java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                           CountLimitException
        This method handles loading the map to the UI from input file by parsing and checking validity of the map
        Throws:
        CannotFindException - file format is invalid
        DuplicatesException - country is duplicated
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - file is not found
        CountLimitException - continent has more or less than fixed number of country

      • saveMapHandler

        public void saveMapHandler()
                    throws CannotFindException,
                           CountLimitException
        This methods handles validation of edited map file before saving outputting to a file
        Throws:
        CannotFindException - file format is invalid
        CountLimitException - continent has more or less than fixed number of country

      • newMapHandler

        public void newMapHandler()
        This method handles generating a new map with new file name

      • startWithCards

        public void startWithCards()
        This method initialize the initial number of cards for each player

      • startGameHandler

        public void startGameHandler()
        This method handles setting number of players, calculating starting armies in each country, it assigns countries to players and determines round robin turn. Once all of these are done it will set the phase to reinforcement.

      • renderView

        public void renderView()
        This method updates the view of continent, territory and adjacent territory

        This method initializes fixed continents in the UI

      • setDeck

        public void setDeck()
        This method initializes the deck of our game

      • determinePlayersStartingOrder

        public void determinePlayersStartingOrder()
        This method calculates the round robin. It first roll the dice to determine who goes first. The player who rolls the highest number starts the game. Then the play order goes clockwise from the starting player. The game starts after the order of play has been determined.

      • assignCountriesToPlayers

        public void assignCountriesToPlayers()
        This method assigns countries to players

      • autoAssignCountriesToPlayers

        public void autoAssignCountriesToPlayers()
        This method random assigns armies to setup stage

      • calcStartingArmies

        public void calcStartingArmies()
        This method sets the starting armies during initialization based on number of PlayerModel.getPlayerModel().

      • calcStartingArmiesHelper

        public int calcStartingArmiesHelper(int getPlayerSize)
        This is a helper method for setStartingPoints. Based on the number of players it returns inital army count.
        Parameters:
        getPlayerSize - number of players
        Returns:
        startingP initial army count
